branchCategory.name: NC(D)A1, NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Stroke Options
branchCategory.description: <p>Series NCA1 medium duty tie rod cylinders are NFPA interchangeable, have a crimped piston rod assembly, are pre-lubricated and available in 12 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 1.5 to 4 inches.  The XB9 low speed option allows for smooth movements, even at 0.4 inches per second. The XC8/XC9 adjustable stroke options feature an infinitely adjustable stop position within the adjustable range. </p>

breadCrumb.name: NC(D)A1, NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Stroke Options
